other_title: サイボーグ００９ 怪獣戦争 (Japanese)
009 en la Guerra contra el Monstruo (Spanish)
plot: Cyborg 009 and his team are re-united to fight the latest menace from the Black Ghost. Before they can tackle their foe the team must overcome an army of monsters sent to stop them, including giant jellyfish, stingrays, plesiosaurs and treacherous cyborgs.
